message: Starting independent review of Schema & Core Implementation phase deliverables
Investigating deliverables - checking agent outputs to understand what was actually built
Testing deliverables - verifying SQLite implementation and database operations
Evaluating phase deliverables against success criteria
Finalizing review - evaluating completeness of implementation against success criteria

Review complete: APPROVED. Schema & Core Implementation phase successfully delivered SQLite database with full schema, comprehensive state_db.py module (40+ functions), MCP server integration, and Dashboard API migration. System now uses SQLite as single source of truth with accurate real-time counts.
